sentences.cn: 缓坡

sentences.en: a pleasant garden that slopes down to the river
sentences.cn: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

sentences.en: a steep slope
sentences.cn: 陡坡

sentences.en: After a mile, the slope steepened.
sentences.cn: 过了一英里后，山坡变陡了。

sentences.en: From the slope below, the wild goats bleated faintly.
sentences.cn: 山坡下面，野山羊咩咩地轻声叫着。

sentences.en: He looked up the slope of land that rose from the house.
sentences.cn: 他抬头看了看屋后的斜坡。

sentences.en: He put the jeep in four-wheel drive and splashed up the slope.
sentences.cn: 他将吉普车切换为四轮驱动模式后涉水爬上了坡。

sentences.en: He scrambled sideways down the scree slope.
sentences.cn: 他沿着碎石坡的一侧爬了下来。

sentences.en: He wonders why the digits on his calculator slope to the right.
sentences.cn: 他不明白为什么他的计算器上面的数字向右倾斜。

sentences.en: I shall need you to hand me up on this difficult slope.
sentences.cn: 我需你扶我上这个陡坡.

sentences.en: She looked back up the grassy slope.
sentences.cn: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.en: Suddenly I was cartwheeling down the slope, all orientation gone.
sentences.cn: 突然，我骨碌碌地滚下坡，完全晕头转向了。

sentences.en: The bank sloped down sharply to the river.
sentences.cn: 那座堤岸陡峭地朝着那条河倾斜下去。

sentences.en: the downward slope of a hill
sentences.cn: 向下的山坡

sentences.en: the men sloped off looking ashamed of themselves.
sentences.cn: 那些人悄悄溜走了，满脸羞愧的样子。

sentences.en: The slope increases as you go up the curve.
sentences.cn: 上了弯道以后，路越来越陡。

sentences.en: The slope is too steep for us to climb.
sentences.cn: 这斜坡太陡,我们爬不上去.

sentences.en: The town is built on a slope .
sentences.cn: 这座城建在斜坡上。

sentences.en: We live on the westward slope of the hill.
sentences.cn: 我们住在这座山的西山坡.

sentences.en: We ran down the hill along the gentle slope.
sentences.cn: 我们顺着和缓的斜坡跑下山.

sentences.en: We slid down the grassy slope.
sentences.cn: 我们从草坡上滑了下来。
